snippet.title: Sword of Atlas Developer Interview 1: Production and Narrative
snippet.description:
Every week(ish) we will be talking to the developers of Sword of Atlas to hear about their process and the state of the game. 

Be sure to check out our latest playable build on Itch.io!
https://sword-of-atlas.itch.io/

~~ 
Sword of Atlas is a TRPG (Tactical Role-Playing Game) that combines tactical grid combat with turn meter action economy to create a fast, frenetic, and strategic gameplay experience unique amongst the TRPG genre. The real-time action combines with a character-driven story to create a high-stakes environment where your actions will determine the fate of your party.
